method.text: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add the onion and cook for 5 min until softened. Stir in the beans, chicken, chillies, oregano and fresh tomato. Warm through, then remove pan from heat.
Blend the canned tomatoes in a food processor or blender. Place the chilli powder, cumin and blended tomatoes in a saucepan and simmer for 2 min. Remove from heat.

Dip each tortilla into the blended tomato mixture and set aside on a plate. Fill each one with 3 tablespoons of the chicken mixture. Roll up and place, seam-side down, in an ovenproof dish. Spoon the salsa over the enchiladas. Sprinkle with the cheese. Bake in the oven at for 20 min.
